channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [LIM][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 23, 04:30 - 08:30 UTC

Jul 10, 19:25 UTC

item.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - 36A14
item.description:
Jul 10, 08:24 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 09/07/2024 18:00 UTC
End Time : 10/07/2024 06 :00 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to disjunction.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 9, 22:14 UTC
Update - Customers instances have been migrated temporarily to other hosts the time that the problem has been resolved.
No more impact is observed for customers instances.
Our technical teams are currently working to solve the issue.

Jul 9, 18:22 UTC
Identified - Start time: 09/07/2024 18:00 UTC
User impact : Some servers in rack 36A14 are temporarily unavailable.
Root cause : Incident due to disjunction.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix.

item.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - Vmotion
item.description:
Jul 8, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 19, 22:40 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 08/07/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 12/07/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack R831B26
item.description:
Jul 7, 13:25 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/07/2024 12:45 UTC
End Time : 07/07/2024 13:15 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in rack R831B26 were temporarily unavailable
Root cause : Electrical issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
